âœ¨ Key Features: â€¢ RGBA video generation â€¢ Transparency support in text-to-video models â€¢ Diffusion transformer (DiT) architecture â€¢ LoRA-based fine-tuning â€¢ Joint RGB and alpha channel generation
ðŸ“– Summary: TransPixeler is a method for extending pretrained video models to generate RGBA videos, which include alpha channels for transparency. It uses a diffusion transformer architecture and LoRA-based fine-tuning to jointly generate RGB and alpha channels with high consistency, enabling the creation of diverse and realistic visual effects.
